net.sf.JRecord.Details

Interface RecordDecider

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    IRecordDeciderX

    public interface RecordDecider
    Cobol Copybooks do not provide a means to determine which Record applies to a particular Data-Line. Most of the time this does not matter but there are exceptions (e.g. Constants.IO_CONTINOUS_NO_LINE_MARKER).

    One way to tell JRecord / RecordEditor which Record to use for a Data-line is to define a RecordDecider. 

       iobuilder.setRecordDecider(myRecordDecider);
    Author:
    Bruce Martin

      Get the Record to use for a specific line
